title: HAP 102 - From Cuba with Love - Juan Rene Betancourt
itunes:title: HAP 102 - From Cuba with Love - Juan Rene Betancourt
description: The Cuban activist and author Juan Rene Betancourt urges racial solidarity and reckons with the revolution under Castro and the island’s turn towards Communism.
content:encoded: The Cuban activist and author Juan Rene Betancourt urges racial solidarity and reckons with the revolution under Castro and the island’s turn towards Communism.
itunes:subtitle: The Cuban activist and author Juan Rene Betancourt urges racial solidarity and reckons with the revolution under Castro and the island’s turn towards Communism.
itunes:summary: The Cuban activist and author Juan Rene Betancourt urges racial solidarity and reckons with the revolution under Castro and the island’s turn towards Communism.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
